meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that toxemias can be harmful if not treated.
meanings.sent2: The nurse studied different cases of toxemias in medical journals.
meanings.sent3: The classroom erupted in laughter when the teacher accidentally said 'toxemias' instead of 'toxemia'.
meanings.sent4: The city was like a body suffering from toxemias, with pollution acting as the toxins in the blood.
meanings.sent5: The image of toxemias creeping through the body stuck in the students' minds.

meanings.definition: Toxemias: a condition characterized by the presence of toxins in the blood
meanings.sent1: The hospital treated many patients with severe toxemias last year.
meanings.sent2: Toxemias can lead to serious health complications if not addressed promptly.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character joked about having 'toxemias' after eating too much junk food.
meanings.sent4: The toxins in the blood danced like little devils in the case of severe toxemias.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the toxins in the blood was overwhelming in cases of toxemias.
